Class JUploadTextArea

java.lang.Object

                      wjhk.jupload2.gui.JUploadTextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class JUploadTextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextArea

This class represents the text area for debug output.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          A thread, that will be called in the EventDispatcherThread, to have a tread-safe update of the GUI.

Field Detail

MAX_LOG_WINDOW_LENGTH

public static final int MAX_LOG_WINDOW_LENGTH
Maximum number of characters in the logWindow.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

messages

java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> messages
The queue, that contains all messages to display. They will be displayed by the JUploadTextArea.LogMessageThread thread.

logMessageThread

JUploadTextArea.LogMessageThread logMessageThread
The thread, that will put messages in the debug log.

Constructor Detail

JUploadTextArea

public JUploadTextArea(int rows,
                       int columns)
Constructs a new empty TextArea with the specified number of rows and columns.

Parameters:
rows - The desired number of text rows (lines).
columns - The desired number of columns.
Method Detail

displayMsg

public final void displayMsg(java.lang.String str)
Add a string to the queue of string to be added to the logWindow. This is necessary, to manage the non-thread-safe Swing environment.

Parameters:
str - The string to add, at the end of the JUploadTextArea.
